name: Xyori, Grind Lord
imagePrompt: A determined digital chronicler, Xyori, hunched over a glowing keyboard in a dimly lit, dark mode room. A coffee cup sits beside them, and a smartphone displays a meme. Emojis float around them.
abilityText: Battlecry: Refresh 1 Mana Crystal. 'Sleep is for the weak. Coffee is for the strong. Memes are forever.'
flavorText: My bio isn't just a label, mate. It's a commitment to the grind. Still working. Still posting. Still awake at 4am.
